title: Whitby After Dark
description: Lenore Lee wants nothing more than to make new friends in her new town of Whitby, Yorkshire, and to forget about the disturbing dreams that hold her captive at night. But what she discovers in Whitby, might be even more disturbing than the dreams. Dreams which may hold the key to her survival in the hidden world of the Supernatural...'Whitby After Dark' - Golden Book Reader's Choice Semifinalist Award in Horror 2017 (Golden Box Books Publishing).
author: Stella Coulson
